title: Patch 6.23 Failure (Error Code 004)
body: Installing patch 6.23 gives me error 004. I tried patching on old/new client and it still wont work. I'm really confused. Not sure what's going on or why this is happening. Am I the only one with this issue? If anyone else has this problem and found a way to fix it please let me know. I'm not sure what to do...

replies.body: Alright, thank u so much for the help. Really appreciate it :)

As an update, we created a new support article with instructions on [reporting patching issues with the updated client.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/230673527)  You can take this route instead of using the client discussion boards.

I did the uninstall and re-install thing and well so far everything seemed fine. When the installation was completed, everything opened automatically. Then I had to upgrade to the alpha client again but something isn't right because when I click "upgrade now" it doesn't do anything. It just stays on the legacy client launch screen and when I click "LAUNCH" It says this... "League of legends has encountered a problem. Please re-install league alpha client to try again" (I'll take a screenshot and send a link now) 

https://gyazo.com/865e14ec5d5c9243762e94e84a399a28

I dont understand... I followed every instructions the re-install link u sent above gave me... And now I ran into this other problem... Is there any way u can help me with this problem? I tried to figure it out for almost 3 hours and nothing works....

Thanks for the update, though the bad news is a bummer.  What happens if you try to run the legacy client?  It's possible that the reinstall became corrupted again.  Your best may be to report your issue and use the legacy client for now.  Let me know, though.

The thing is it doesn't upgrade or anything, it just stays on the legacy launch screen and when I click "LAUNCH" (on the legacy client) it says I need to re-install the alpha client but when I try to nothing works... This is really depressing, I've been doing all I could :( I have a headache from trying to figure this out... 6.23 wont patch. Alpha client wont upgrade and I cant use the legacy client because it says I need to upgrade to the alpha client.. Nothing works....

I was afraid of that, but thanks for confirming.  The legacy and updated clients use the same files, so if it won't work on one then it likely will be the same for the other.  In this case you may need a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)without upgrading, until a resolution is found.

Omfggggg!! It's finally patching! I believe it will work now.. Thank u so much for the help!!!!!! I honestly really appreciate it... Been trying to figure this out for like 3 hours wow. When I re-installed again, when the alpha client upgrade popped up instead of clicking "upgrade now" I clicked "do it later" then hit accept and it started patching so I believe I will be able to use the legacy client! :) Thank u so much for the help! When it finishes patch I will let u know if I logged in :) Thanks once again for the help and support, honestly really appreciate it
@Redbearded1984 - Yeah bro that sucks. Sorry about that. Hope everything works out for u too
Alright, patching took 3 hours. It legit now finished.. I was able to log in on the legacy client thanks once again Porocles! <3

It seems that the update didn't go through properly and become corrupt.  Since the updated client uses files of the legacy, both versions can end up having issues.  A [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)here should fix this up.  I also recommend posting this in our[ client discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards to let the client devs know about this error and error code.
bro i have the same problem.... and idk why ....

I'm having trouble right now with error code 004 for patch 7.8 I don't know what to do. I tried everything from disabling firewall and downloading what whatever it is that is required just to league. I can't even go into game. -_-  This is also on the new client too. Help!!!
How do I treat this problem
I've been trying to play for a week now but this new update sucks, I tried going to the legacy client but it take forever to lunch or get even stuck.
Disable your antivirus and firewall while you're patching the game, for me that was the problem.

Whatever is necessary for your league client to work is posted up above by Porocles. Just follow the instructions the links give u and u should be all set. I had to uninstall and re-install tho. It's part of the process.
This is so annoying to go from a working game last night to a can't login unspecified error!!!
It's still patching. Currently at 36% no idea why it's taking so long but i believe it will work. Thanks once again
Okay, thanks :)

Same exact thing happened to me, and when I tried to join a match, it was immediate bugsplat. I think the match is still going on, and I'll probably recieve a LeaverBuster. After I tried to relaunch League, it said some of the files were corrupt, as well.
i am having the same exact problem and i hope riot can fix this FAST
This guy has a good fix https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NU5UFXrAUMk&t=4s
